body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nuhaṃ pabbatakandarāsu, ekākiyo addutiyo vihassaṃ;
body.gathalast: Aniccato sabbabhavaṃ vipassaṃ, taṃ me idaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nuhaṃ bhinnapaṭandharo muni, kāsāvavattho amamo nirāso;
body.gathalast: Rāgañca dosañca tatheva mohaṃ, hantvā sukhī pavanagato vihassaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā aniccaṃ vadharoganīḷaṃ, kāyaṃ imaṃ maccujarāyupaddutaṃ;
body.gathalast: Vipassamāno vītabhayo vihassaṃ, eko vane taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nuhaṃ bhayajananiṃ dukhāvahaṃ, taṇhālataṃ bahuvidhānuvattaniṃ;
body.gathalast: Paññāmayaṃ tikhiṇamasiṃ gahetvā, chetvā vase tampi kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nu paññāmayamuggatejaṃ, satthaṃ isīnaṃ sahasādiyitvā;
body.gathalast: Māraṃ sasenaṃ sahasā bhañjissaṃ, sīhāsane taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nuhaṃ sabbhi samāgamesu, diṭṭho bhave dhammagarūhi tādibhi;
body.gathalast: Yāthāvadassīhi jitindriyehi, padhāniyo taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nu maṃ tandi khudā pipāsā, vātātapā kīṭasarīsapā vā;
body.gathalast: Na bādhayissanti na taṃ giribbaje, atthatthiyaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nu kho yaṃ viditaṃ mahesinā, cattāri saccāni sududdasāni;
body.gathalast: Samāhitatto satimā agacchaṃ, paññāya taṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nu rūpe amite ca sadde, gandhe rase phusitabbe ca dhamme;
body.gathalast: Ādittatohaṃ samathehi yutto, paññāya dacchaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nuhaṃ dubbacanena vutto, tatonimittaṃ vimano na hessaṃ;
body.gathalast: Atho pasatthopi tatonimittaṃ, tuṭṭho na hessaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nu kaṭṭhe ca tiṇe latā ca, khandhe imehaṃ amite ca dhamme;
body.gathalast: Ajjhattikāneva ca bāhirāni ca, samaṃ tuleyyaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nu maṃ pāvusakālamegho, navena toyena sacīvaraṃ vane;
body.gathalast: Isippayātamhi pathe vajantaṃ, ovassate taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā mayūrassa sikhaṇḍino vane, dijassa sutvā girigabbhare rutaṃ;
body.gathalast: Paccuṭṭhahitvā amatassa pattiyā, saṃcintaye taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nu gaṅgaṃ yamunaṃ sarassatiṃ, pātālakhittaṃ vaḷavāmukhañcabalavāmukhañca ;
body.gathalast: Asajjamāno patareyyamiddhiyā, vibhiṃsanaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā nu nāgova asaṅgacārī, padālaye kāmaguṇesu chandaṃ;
body.gathalast: Nibbajjayaṃ sabbasubhaṃ nimittaṃ, jhāne yuto taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kadā iṇaṭṭova daliddakodaḷiddako nidhiṃ, ārādhayitvā dhanikehi pīḷito;
body.gathalast: Tuṭṭho bhavissaṃ adhigamma sāsanaṃ, mahesino taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Bahūni vassāni tayāmhi yācito, ‘agāravāsena alaṃ nu te idaṃ’;
body.gathalast: Taṃ dāni maṃ pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ, kiṃkāraṇā citta tuvaṃ na yuñjasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nanu ahaṃ citta tayāmhi yācito, ‘giribbaje citrachadā vihaṅgamā’;
body.gathalast: Mahindaghosatthanitābhigajjino, te taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyinaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kulamhi mitte ca piye ca ñātake, khiḍḍāratiṃ kāmaguṇañca loke;
body.gathalast: Sabbaṃ pahāya imamajjhupāgato, athopi tvaṃ citta na mayha tussasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mameva etaṃ na hi tvaṃ paresaṃ, sannāhakāle paridevitena kiṃ;
body.gathalast: Sabbaṃ idaṃ calamiti pekkhamāno, abhinikkhamiṃ amatapadaṃ jigīsaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Suyuttavādī dvipadānamuttamo, mahābhisakko naradammasārathisārathī ;
body.gathalast: ‘Cittaṃ calaṃ makkaṭasannibhaṃ iti, avītarāgena sudunnivārayaṃ’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, aviddasū yattha sitā puthujjanā;
body.gathalast: Te dukkhamicchanti punabbhavesino, cittena nītā niraye nirākatā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Mayūrakoñcābhirutamhi kānane, dīpīhi byagghehi purakkhato vasaṃ;
body.gathalast: Kāye apekkhaṃ jaha mā virādhaya’, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Bhāvehi jhānāni ca indriyāni ca, balāni bojjhaṅgasamādhibhāvanā;
body.gathalast: Tisso ca vijjā phusa buddhasāsane’, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Bhāvehi maggaṃ amatassa pattiyā, niyyānikaṃ sabbadukhakkhayogadhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ sabbakilesasodhanaṃ’, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Dukkhanti khandhe paṭipassa yoniso, yato ca dukkhaṃ samudeti taṃ jaha;
body.gathalast: Idheva dukkhassa karohi antaṃ’, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Aniccaṃ dukkhanti vipassa yoniso, suññaṃ anattāti aghaṃ vadhanti ca;
body.gathalast: Manovicāre uparundha cetaso’, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Muṇḍo virūpo abhisāpamāgato, kapālahatthova kulesu bhikkhasu;
body.gathalast: Yuñjassu satthuvacane mahesino’, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Susaṃvutatto visikhantare caraṃ, kulesu kāmesu asaṅgamānaso;
body.gathalast: Cando yathā dosinapuṇṇamāsiyā’, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Āraññiko hohi ca piṇḍapātiko, sosāniko hohi ca paṃsukūliko;
body.gathalast: Nesajjiko hohi sadā dhute rato’, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ropetva rukkhāni yathā phalesī, mūle taruṃ chettu tameva icchasi;
body.gathalast: Tathūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ karosi, yaṃ maṃ aniccamhi cale niyuñjasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Arūpa dūraṅgama ekacāri, na te karissaṃ vacanaṃ idānihaṃ;
body.gathalast: Dukkhā hi kāmā kaṭukā mahabbhayā, nibbānamevābhimano carissaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nāhaṃ alakkhyā ahirikkatāya vā, na cittahetū na ca dūrakantanā;
body.gathalast: Ājīvahetū ca ahaṃ na nikkhamiṃ, kato ca te citta paṭissavo mayā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Appicchatā sappurisehi vaṇṇitā, makkhappahānaṃ vūpasamo dukhassa’;
body.gathalast: Itissu maṃ citta tadā niyuñjasi, idāni tvaṃ gacchasi pubbaciṇṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṇhā avijjā ca piyāpiyañca, subhāni rūpāni sukhā ca vedanā;
body.gathalast: Manāpiyā kāmaguṇā ca vantā, vante ahaṃ āvamituṃ na ussahe.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sabbattha te citta vaco kataṃ mayā, bahūsu jātīsu na mesi kopito;
body.gathalast: Ajjhattasambhavo kataññutāya te, dukkhe ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ tayā kate.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tvaññeva no citta karosi brāhmaṇobrāhmaṇebrāhmaṇaṃ , tvaṃ khattiyo rājadasīrājadisī karosi;
body.gathalast: Vessā ca suddā ca bhavāma ekadā, devattanaṃ vāpi taveva vāhasā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taveva hetū asurā bhavāmase, tvaṃmūlakaṃ nerayikā bhavāmase;
body.gathalast: Atho tiracchānagatāpi ekadā, petattanaṃ vāpi taveva vāhasā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nanu dubbhissasi maṃ punappunaṃ, muhuṃ muhuṃ cāraṇikaṃva dassayaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ummattakeneva mayā palobhasi, kiñcāpi te citta virādhitaṃ mayā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ, yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tadajjahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso, hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Satthā ca me lokamimaṃ adhiṭṭhahi,aniccato addhuvato asārato;
body.gathalast: Pakkhanda maṃ citta jinassa sāsane, tārehi oghā mahatā suduttarā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na te idaṃ citta yathā purāṇakaṃ, nāhaṃ alaṃ tuyha vase nivattituṃvasena vattituṃ ;
body.gathalast: Mahesino pabbajitomhi sāsane, na mādisā honti vināsadhārino.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nagā samuddā saritā vasundharā, disā catasso vidisā adho divā;
body.gathalast: Sabbe aniccā tibhavā upaddutā, kuhiṃ gato citta sukhaṃ ramissasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dhitipparaṃ kiṃ mama citta kāhisi, na te alaṃ citta vasānuvattako;
body.gathalast: Na jātu bhastaṃ ubhatomukhaṃ chupe, dhiratthu pūraṃ nava sotasandaniṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Varāhaeṇeyyavigāḷhasevite, pabbhārakuṭṭe pakateva sundare;
body.gathalast: Navambunā pāvusasitthakānane, tahiṃ guhāgehagato ramissasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sunīlagīvā susikhā supekhunā, sucittapattacchadanā vihaṅgamā;
body.gathalast: Sumañjughosatthanitābhigajjino, te taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyinaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vuṭṭhamhi deve caturaṅgule tiṇe, saṃpupphite meghanibhamhi kānane;
body.gathalast: Nagantare viṭapisamo sayissaṃ, taṃ me mudū hehiti tūlasannibhaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tathā tu kassāmi yathāpi issaro, yaṃ labbhati tenapi hotu me alaṃ;
body.gathalast: Na tāhaṃ kassāmi yathā atandito, biḷārabhastaṃva yathā sumadditaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tathā tu kassāmi yathāpi issaro, yaṃ labbhati tenapi hotu me alaṃ;
body.gathalast: Vīriyena taṃ mayha vasānayissaṃ, gajaṃva mattaṃ kusalaṅkusaggaho.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tayā sudantena avaṭṭhitena hi, hayena yoggācariyova ujjunā;
body.gathalast: Pahomi maggaṃ paṭipajjituṃ sivaṃ, cittānurakkhīhi sadā nisevitaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ārammaṇe taṃ balasā nibandhisaṃ, nāgaṃva thambhamhi daḷhāya rajjuyā;
body.gathalast: Taṃ me suguttaṃ satiyā subhāvitaṃ, anissitaṃ sabbabhavesu hehisi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Paññāya chetvā vipathānusārinaṃ, yogena niggayha pathe nivesiya;
body.gathalast: Disvā samudayaṃ vibhavañca sambhavaṃ, dāyādako hehisi aggavādino.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Catubbipallāsavasaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ, gāmaṇḍalaṃva parinesi citta maṃ;
body.gathalast: Nanu nūna (sī.) saṃyojanabandhanacchidaṃ, saṃsevase kāruṇikaṃ mahāmuniṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Migo yathā seri sucittakānane, rammaṃ giriṃ pāvusaabbhamāliniṃ māliṃ (?);
body.gathalast: Anākule tattha nage ramissaṃramissasi , asaṃsayaṃ citta parā bhavissasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ye tuyha chandena vasena vattino, narā ca nārī ca anubhonti yaṃ sukhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Aviddasū māravasānuvattino, bhavābhinandī tava citta sāvakā’’ti.
body.gatha1: Paññāsamhi nipātamhi, eko tālapuṭo suci;
body.gathalast: Gāthāyo tattha paññāsa, puna pañca ca uttarīti.
